#include <iostream> #include <string>

using namespace std;

int main(){ int n; string s; cin » n; for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){ cin » s;

	if(s.length() == 5){
		cout << 3 << endl;
	} else {
		bool one = (s[0] == 'o' && s[2] == 'e') || (s[0] == 'o' && s[1] == 'n') ||
				(s[1] == 'n' && s[2] == 'e');
	
		cout << (one ? 1:2) << endl; 

	}

	

}
	



return 0;

}
